setting: In the ancient and forgotten city of Eldra, a hushed whisper persists among its ruined halls. Long abandoned by its inhabitants after whispers of a curse spread, Eldra sits cloaked in mystical fog, hiding relics of untold power. Adventurers seeking fame and fortune venture into its depths, drawn by the promise of a legendary artifact â€“ the Eternal Lumina, said to reveal the secrets of the universe. Lush greenery reclaims much of the city's architecture, creating an eerie, yet beautiful, maze.
mystery: The once-thriving city of Eldra fell curse-bound overnight, its populace vanished without a trace. Rumor has it that betrayal within the ruling counsel led to the release of a forbidden magic, sealing the city's fate. The player's task is to unravel who betrayed Eldra and why, piecing together fragmented tales and forgotten truths from the city's spectral echoes.
final_prize: The Eternal Lumina, a gem of immense power that holds the wisdom of the ages and the key to undo the curse on Eldra, restoring it to its former glory.

character.name: Kieran the Caretaker
character.key_interaction: Convince Kieran of your intentions to restore Eldra, and he will share a map containing hidden paths to the next room.

character.name: Sirena the Silent
character.key_interaction: Decipher the ancient melodies she hums, which unveil a hidden truth about the counsel's betrayal.

character.name: Kael the Botanist
character.key_interaction: Persuade him to share his memories of the night Eldra was cursed, revealing a key suspect.

character.name: Vael the Stargazer
character.role: Archivist and keeper of celestial records
character.key_interaction: Interpret his cryptic astrological insights, which point to the archival records of betrayal hidden in constellations.

character.name: Liora the Oracle
character.role: Final guardian of the Eternal Lumina
character.key_interaction: Solve her riddles of identity and truth, which test the player's understanding of the narrative and intentions.
